mapper.select: SELECT created_at, product_seq, product_code, product_cost, product_count, product_country, sell_count, product_name, category_seq, (1- ( SELECT coupon_ratio FROM tbl_coupon WHERE coupon_seq = ( SELECT coupon_seq FROM tbl_cp WHERE tbl_cp.product_seq = p.product_seq ) ) / 100) * p.product_cost discounted_cost, ( SELECT image_name FROM tbl_image WHERE tbl_image.product_seq = p.product_seq AND tbl_image.image_type = 'MAIN' ) image_name, (SELECT coupon_ratio FROM tbl_coupon WHERE coupon_seq = ( SELECT coupon_seq FROM tbl_cp WHERE tbl_cp.product_seq = p.product_seq )) coupon_ratio FROM tbl_product p where product_seq = ${product_seq}

select P.product_seq, P.product_code, O.order_seq, P.product_code, P.product_name, O.order_total_cost from tbl_product P, tbl_op OP, tbl_order O where P.product_seq = OP.product_seq and OP.order_seq = O.order_seq and O.user_seq = #{seq}
select O.order_seq, P.product_code from tbl_product P, tbl_op OP, tbl_order O where P.product_seq = OP.product_seq and OP.order_seq = O.order_seq and O.order_seq = #{seq}

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, s.product_name, s.created_at, s.product_seq, s.product_code, s.product_cost, s.product_count, s.product_country, s.discounted_cost, s.coupon_ratio, s.sell_count, s.image_name, s.category_seq FROM (SELECT * FROM p_image_discount) s
where s.category_seq IN ( SELECT category_seq FROM tbl_category WHERE category_ref = ${first_category} )
AND s.category_seq = ${second_category}
AND s.product_name like '%' || '${search_text}' || '%'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
ORDER BY sell_count DESC
ORDER BY created_at DESC
ORDER BY discounted_cost ASC
ORDER BY discounted_cost DESC
ORDER BY created_at DESC )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, s.product_name, s.created_at, s.product_seq, s.product_code, s.product_cost, s.product_count, s.product_country, s.discounted_cost, s.coupon_ratio, s.sell_count, s.image_name, s.category_seq FROM (SELECT * FROM p_image_discount) s
where s.category_seq IN ( SELECT category_seq FROM tbl_category WHERE category_ref = ${first_category} )
and ROWNUM <= ${page_num} * 30
AND s.category_seq = ${second_category}
AND s.product_name like '%' || '${search_text}' || '%'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
ORDER BY sell_count DESC
ORDER BY created_at DESC
ORDER BY discounted_cost ASC
ORDER BY discounted_cost DESC
ORDER BY created_at DESC )
WHERE rn > ( ${page_num} - 1 ) * 30
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM p_image_discount ORDER BY sell_count DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product (product_seq, product_code, product_name, product_info, product_detail, product_brand, product_manufacture, product_country, product_count, op2_seq1, op2_seq2, op2_seq3, op2_seq4, op2_seq5, category_seq, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (seq_product.NEXTVAL, #{product_code}, #{product_name}, #{product_info}, #{product_detail}, #{product_brand}, #{product_manufacture}, #{product_country}, #{product_count}, #{op2_seq1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{op2_seq2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{op2_seq3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{op2_seq4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{op2_seq5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category_seq}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product SET PRODUCT_NAME = #{product_name}, PRODUCT_INFO = #{product_info}, PRODUCT_DETAIL = #{product_detail}, PRODUCT_BRAND = #{product_brand}, PRODUCT_MANUFACTURE = #{product_manufacture}, PRODUCT_COUNTRY = #{product_country}, PRODUCT_COUNT = #{product_count}, OP2_SEQ1 = #{op2_seq1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP2_SEQ2 = #{op2_seq2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP2_SEQ3 = #{op2_seq3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP2_SEQ4 = #{op2_seq4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP2_SEQ5 = #{op2_seq5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_SEQ = #{category_seq}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ = #{seq}
